title: League chat is down?
body: When i launch league  it says there is a error and keeps trying to reconnecting to chat ? but i can still play solo q or duo with friends

replies.body:
Hey there,

There is currently a known issue affecting chat, network operations are currently working on the problem.

For further updates, see the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) page.

>Network Operations â€“ 12:17 PM
We're aware of a problem causing chat to have issues, and are working on a fix.
Ya it doesn't work I can't duo.. It just says error on the home page.. wtf? is this
Same here.  Doing a client repair, but I don't think that'll change anything.
